author: iSazonov
body:
Related #3238

1. Add autoload for test modules
2. Move TestHostCS.psm1 to 'test\tools\Modules\' folder (later we shall move the remaining modules)
3. Remove explicit load TestHostCS.psm1 from test files

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @PowerShell/area-test, Does anyone have any comments here.  I left one comment on what  @iSazonov should change if we take this and one about what is wrong with making this change.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @TravisEz13 Is The PR ready to merge?

title: Add autoload for test modules
